comment:
Nose: at first musty, tobacco, cigarette, but followed by banana and tropical fruit on the back. As tasting goes on, more and more banana becomes apparent on the front.
Taste: light vanilla, banana and floral mixed with a peaty tobacco smoke. Smooth and buttery. Incredibly well balanced.
Finish: medium-long, light peat, ashy

End of bottle at time of rating but consistently one of my favorites. Great summer dram.
Warm, peaty, cherry cough syrup, wood,  spicy, peppery, hot finish
Smooth, lightly smoked with oak and a touch of tobacco
